_header: O blessed maid flower of all goodness
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: John Lydgate, a prayer to the Virgin Mary inserted by Lydgate in his translation of Deguileville’s Pèlerinage de la Vie Humaine — four 8-line stanzas

BLSto952.First Lines: O blyssed mayde fflour off alle goodnesseOn alle synfull ha Mercy and pyte…
BLSto952.Last Lines: …And syth my trust ys Only sette in theBe my Reffuge In Trybulacion
BLSto952.Note: Includes “Lenvoye” of 8 lines on f. 299v, followed by “Explicit.”
